name: GO GO Gamebert!
description:
How much loot can you take?
A Gamebert Game for the 5th Klagenfurt Winter Jam!

Note: For some reason, no loading screen is shown, and loading might take a little while. Please be patient while Gamebert is preparing!

Instructions: Touch / Mouse controls (Space can be used for jumping)
Get as far as you can! Gather as many loot boxes as you can!
Yes, the game design decisions in this game were made on purpose.


Github: https://github.com/YenR/GoGo_Gamebert
Game Over music inspired by Yakuza 0 OST - Baka mitai
Free box asset used:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/interior/animated-pbr-chest-demo-...
